content:
TITLE: Install 1Panel using a Bash script
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to install 1Panel using a bash script. The script downloads and executes the `quick_start.sh` script from the 1Panel resource server. This is the recommended way to get started with 1Panel.
SOURCE: https://github.com/1panel-dev/1panel/blob/dev/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
curl -sSL https://resource.1panel.pro/quick_start.sh -o quick_start.sh && bash quick_start.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Executing Quick Start Script (bash)
DESCRIPTION: This command downloads and executes a bash script to quickly install 1Panel. It uses curl to fetch the script from a remote URL and then executes it using bash.  This is the recommended way to install 1Panel according to the documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/1panel-dev/1panel/blob/dev/docs/README.es.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
curl -sSL https://resource.1panel.pro/quick_start.sh -o quick_start.sh && bash quick_start.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Executing 1Panel Quick Start Script (Bash)
DESCRIPTION: This snippet downloads and executes the 1Panel quick start script. It uses `curl` to fetch the script from the specified URL and then executes it using `bash`. This is the recommended method for installing 1Panel.


----------------------------------------

TITLE: Install 1Panel using bash
DESCRIPTION: This command downloads and executes a bash script to quickly install 1Panel on a Linux server. It uses curl to fetch the script and bash to execute it. This is a quick start method for installing 1Panel.
SOURCE: https://github.com/1panel-dev/1panel/blob/dev/docs/README.pt-br.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```

```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: One-Click 1Panel Installation
DESCRIPTION: This shell command downloads and executes a script for one-click installation of 1Panel. It fetches the `quick_start.sh` script from a remote server using `curl`, saves it locally, and then executes it with `sudo bash`, requiring root privileges. This is suitable for online environments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/1panel-dev/1panel/blob/dev/docs/README.zh-Hans.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
curl -sSL https://resource.fit2cloud.com/1panel/package/quick_start.sh -o quick_start.sh && sudo bash quick_start.sh
```

----------------------------------------

DESCRIPTION: This shell script downloads and executes the 1Panel installation script. It uses curl to fetch the script and bash to execute it. This is a one-click installation method.
SOURCE: https://github.com/1panel-dev/1panel/blob/dev/docs/README.ja.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
curl -sSL https://resource.1panel.pro/quick_start.sh -o quick_start.sh && bash quick_start.sh
```
